bibl.title: Letter from George Miller Sternberg to Calvin DeWitt, January 8, 1900

div1.p: Sternberg stops the annulment of Agramonte's contract. [Courtesy of the National Archives and Records Administration]

div1.head: Letter from George Miller Sternberg to Calvin DeWitt, January 8, 1900
div1.opener:
Sternberg stopped the annulment only one
week before it was to become effective
OFFICE OF SURGEON GENERAL
JAN 8
58657
TELEGRAM.
OFFICIAL BUSINESS
CHARGE TO SURGEON GENERAL
OFFICE-GOVERNMENT RATE
1900 WAR DEPARTMENT.
Surgeon General's Office,
Washington, January 8th, 1900.
CARDED.
DeWitt.
Chief Surgeon,
Havana.
div1.p: Do not annul contract of Acting Assistant Surgeon Agramonte at present
